detail_desc: Hi-top trainers with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit treggings in a stretch weave with a high waist and visible zip in one side.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in a crisp pima cotton weave. Regular waist with a tab and button at the sides, a concealed zip at the back and large patch front pockets with a flap and button. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a premium cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a contrasting colour loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short shorts in airy, fine-knit pointelle made of soft cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chiffon appliqué on the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front and a press-stud on one shoulder.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in viscose jersey with a smocked bodice and short, smocked sleeves with overlocked edges. Overlocked top edge, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif and ears on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Ankle boots in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with covered elastic gores at the sides. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Hooded jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Knee-length dress in heavily draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined front.
Wide, slightly shorter top in crinkled jersey. Wide, gathered shoulder straps with concealed elastication and frill trims, and a low-cut back with elastication at the hem and wide, horizontal ties.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Jersey dress with a motif, long sleeves, a seam at the hip and gathered skirt.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Mesh laundry bags with a zip.

Long, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that meet at the back. Narrow elasticated seam under the bust and flounces down the skirt for added width. Lined down to the hips.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.

Soft, non-wired, push-up bra in mesh with lace details. Moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
High-waisted shorts in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a belt and covered buckle sewn into one side. Patch front pockets with a flap and a concealed zip and button at one side.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.

Short, fitted dress in airy cotton poplin with a smocked, stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Set with a vest top, pair of shorts and a T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Vest top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Classic T-shirt with ribbing around the neckline.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and a seam at the waist.
Small hoop earrings in rigid metal ball chain.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with elastication and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.
Waist belt in two strands of metal snake chain with a decorative knot detail at the front and an adjustable fastener with a small carabiner hook and metal chain.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted top in a rib knit with short sleeves.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.

Straight-cut blouse woven in an airy viscose and cotton blend with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, loose yoke at the shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, glittery skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Straight-cut jacket in soft imitation suede with fringing on the front, back and down the sleeves. Collar, covered buttons down the front and large patch pockets. Lined.
Trousers in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow grandad collar and classic front. Sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Slip-on satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow, double shoulder straps and a racer back in ventilating mesh. Wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Socks in a rib-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.
5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Slim fit.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in a patterned, viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck.

Short, wide dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Long raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in soft linen jersey with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.

Sandals in imitation suede with covered heels. Wide elastic straps at the top, a foot strap at the front and a zip in the heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a small, frilled collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a double frill front and back. Long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.
